name: Meact
description:
Meact is a puzzle game where you must control a robot on both the top and bottom of maze-type levels to collect stars. The bottom and top are different though so remembering the layout is the best way to succeed. Meact was developed in approximately one week for MegaJam 2022 by Global Games,  an international 2-man team from Morroco and the United States. 

Created before the jam: Audio from we love indies. In-game wall art made with Dall-e 2

Instructions: 

WASD - Move

E - Interact

LMB - Zoom

ESC - Exit Game

(Try controller for best experience)

Credits

Programming - Ibrahim Ben Sabih El Imrany

Visuals - Noah Rafael Schumaker Bello

Level Design - Ibrahim Ben Sabih El Imrany
